content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'nyc-taxi-data/raw/calendar.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

select name, location from sys.external_data_sources;
